calculation_screen.date_of_birth_description: Your date of birth reveals your destiny you will face, your hidden talents, the path you‚Äôre made to go and the life purpose your soul desires.

errors.invalid_name: Your name must consist of at least one letter
errors.cannot_be_calculated: This number could not be calculated with your name.

splash_screen.title: Tarot Reading & Numerology
splash_screen.sub_title: Some text that describes the app further in detail

tarot_reading_text: The Tarot is a symbolic map of consciousness that encompasses our journey through life, both spiritually and practically. Tarot reading is the practice of divining wisdom and guidance through a specific spread of Tarot cards. The cards are meant to provide insight into the innermost truths of your higher self. In other words, the cards provide an evolved awareness of what you already know deep within.

info.career: Pull 1 Card to find out about your Career.
info.three_card: Pull 3 Cards to find out about your Career, Love & Future.
info.yes_no: You need an instant answer? Yes/No Tarot helps you with your decision with a simple "Yes" or "No"
info.all_cards: The Tarot Deck consists of 78 cards in total. Here you can find all the lovingly designed cards including their meaning for Career, Love and Future and what the cards tell you when they are drawn in reverse order.
info.numerology: Find out everything about your life with numbers based on your Name and Birthdate.
info.affirmation: Affirmations are positive sentences. They help you to manifest your positive thoughts.
info.gemstone: Gemstones are way more powerful than you ever might have thought. Check them out :)

new_calculation.title: Are you sure you want to create a new profile?
new_calculation.content: This will remove your current profile immediately. You can't undo this action.

affirmation_screen.title: Today's affirmation
affirmation_screen.what_content: Affirmations are positively formulated sentences that help us to transform our beliefs and focus our attention on our goals.
affirmation_screen.how: How to enhance the power of affirmations
affirmation_screen.how_content: Affirmations can be intensified by painting a large isosceles Ypsilon on a sheet. The Y is an uplifting sign and can reinforce any positive affirmation.

get_rid_of_ads: Or get rid of ads forever with Ad Free
watch_ad: Watch a short ad to scratch off your daily affirmation. This keeps the content free. Thanks.
